title: Map Consecutive Elements
description: In this lab, we will explore the mapConsecutive function in JavaScript. This function allows us to map consecutive elements of an array using a given function. We will learn how to use this function to manipulate arrays in a concise and efficient way.

meta.title: Mastering Consecutive Element Mapping in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to use the mapConsecutive function to efficiently manipulate arrays in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, array manipulation, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, consecutive elements, mapping, javascript lab, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Executed
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 映射连续元素
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索 JavaScript 中的 mapConsecutive 函数。该函数允许我们使用给定函数对数组的连续元素进行映射。我们将学习如何使用此函数以简洁高效的方式操作数组。

meta.title: 精通 JavaScript 中的连续元素映射
meta.description: 学习如何使用 mapConsecutive 函数在 JavaScript 中高效地操作数组。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript 练习, 数组操作, 在线 JavaScript 练习, 编程教程, 连续元素, 映射, JavaScript 实验, JavaScript 教程

verify.name: 验证已执行的 Node 命令
verify.hint: 通过在终端/SSH 中输入 'node' 并按回车键，可以运行 JavaScript。
